website_summaries.verdict: A sleek design and top-quality filtration.
pros: Powerful motor delivers 25% more air than similar designs
Includes an activated carbon prefilter, a true HEPA filter, and UV-C light
With a three-speed fan, you can choose the setting for your needs
cons: A few users say it is louder than expected

customer_reviews.title: Give these people all of your money!
customer_reviews.text: For so long I would wake up every morning not able to breathe and my head congested. I knew it had to be from having 2 inside dogs and all the dust that accumulates from them and everyone else. No matter how often I cleaned, I still felt bad. Constantly blowing my nose and taking sinus medicine almost every day. One day I googled and saw that an air purifier would help with all the dust and dog dander. We got this one based on the reviews and it is everything we hoped for! I can breathe again! And yes it also helps with odor!
customer_reviews.author: Remie R.

customer_reviews.title: this thing is awesome!! wow twice as better as my prior ...
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome!! wow twice as better as my prior purifier for only $20 more. the uv light is an actual bulb like 2ft long, no micky mouse bulb here. and the high setting blows air like a blizzard. you can feel the quality. i really wasn't expecting this. A+++
customer_reviews.author: Vi

customer_reviews.title: Does a nice job
customer_reviews.text: It does a great job cleaning the air. I have a dog and a cat and allergies to them and pollen. I have been having trouble sleeping because my sinuses get stuffed up breathing through my mouth causes a sore throat. I put the purifier in my bedroom and within 24 hours I noticed a marked improvement. On the lowest setting, the purifier hardly makes any noise, certainly not enough to keep me awake. It is loud on the highest setting, but I only run it like that when I am not in my bedroom.
customer_reviews.author: justMe

customer_reviews.title: smell
customer_reviews.text: when I first plugged it in and turned it on, it ran not too loud on the meduim setting and a bit loud on the high setting. but as the time when on it had an odor that eventually gave me a headache. it did seem to be doing a great job. After the first day the odor went away. I do feel that it is a good product and I can tell a difference in the air quality.
customer_reviews.author: PNT

customer_reviews.title: does a great job, but the light bulb didn't last
customer_reviews.text: we purchased this because of a mold air quality issue and it made a great impact right away. I would recommend this if you are waking up congested. Unfortunately, not 2 months into owning this air cleaner, the UV light popped in the middle of the night during normal operation. thsi made a loud boom and and let off a smell of burning electrical equipment. we have reordered a new bulb, but most experience that i have with these lights are that they should last 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: chestnut_simple_play

customer_reviews.title: Works great, wish the buttons and lights were better.
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, and I've been using it daily for many weeks now. I think the buttons at the top could be designed better, there could be some built-in memory functions, the button bleeps could be silenceable, and the lights could be dimmer, but as for the tower itself and everything related to its purification and such, it's great and I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be working fine. It is louder than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be working fine. It is louder than I expected, but it is actually a pleasant "white noise," so I don't mind. Sometimes I need to turn the TV up a little louder, but that's no big deal. While it does reduce odors, I don't find it reduces them as much as I would like, but I'm hyper-sensitive to smells, so that might just be me. All in all, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seem to have much effect
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to take care of a problem with an area where boys are residing to stop smelling a bit stagnant. Put on the air purifier in a small room, with the ionizer, black light, and fan full blast. It didn't have any effect. Disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend this product for anyone who is suffering from allergies ...
customer_reviews.text: Have only had this about a week, but noticed almost immediately an improvement with sleep. No allergy drainage causing cough anymore. I would definitely recommend this product for anyone who is suffering from allergies and want a good nights sleep.
customer_reviews.author: M.KS

customer_reviews.title: Great Air Filter fir Asthma and COPD sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I love this air filter I have cleaned several times and it was filled with dust and muck it had cleaned out of the air. For someone like me with asthma it’s Godsend. I can feel the air quality in the part of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Notatroll

customer_reviews.title: Great for pet odor and dander!
customer_reviews.text: Love this tower! I live in a house with 6 animals in a house with no AC or filters. It’s cold enough that I can’t open my windows to air my house out, so no matter what I did I couldn’t get the pet smell and sander out of the air! This filter has been doing great. I can’t smell the pets, litter boxes, and I’ve been breathing easier.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: this seems to be a good product, considering that i am not that technical. but i have really bad allergies and i can tell the difference within minutes of using this machine. i would recommend it for this price point
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the time it lasted.!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well it was good while it lasted... After just 8 months of regular use my filter just completely started turning on and off by itself until a few days later, it completely shut off and i wasn’t able to turn it back on again, and i had change the filter 2 months prior..smhh
customer_reviews.author: Jean Torres

customer_reviews.title: Burned up!
customer_reviews.text: This air purifier lasted a good 6 months before almost burning up! Luckily I was right by it when I noticed a hot burning small and quickly unplugged it... now I'm stuck with a worthless piece of junk that cost me over $120!
customer_reviews.author: Richelle Waligursky

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: Works like it says it does. I used to wake up in the middle of the night coughing a lot/asthma/allergy issues. I've used this two nights now and I have minimal coughing at night. Note that I only turn it on at bedtime so this might be why I still cough.
customer_reviews.author: GabrielasMadre

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work very well. I placed it in a large room and it worked fine. The 3 speed motor is good when you want super quiet The uv light to kill bacteria and virus is great.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Not 100% sure what I was expecting from this unit, but it exceeded all my expectations. I use it daily and one day left it on all day full blast with the doors shut. When I came back the room smelled like a purified hotel room. Highly impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: crisp air
customer_reviews.text: i like the idea the unit was slim and there was not an annoying sound coming from it. I have it in my den ad it seems to work beautifully. I have a dog and i feel there isnt as much dander floating around.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy

customer_reviews.title: I haven't had this item long. I've searched in ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had this item long. I've searched in depth for a product that would eliminate stuffy air, congestion, breathing issues, etc. During the few days of owning this item it seems that I could really see a difference. The air quality seemed very well, I noticed a difference. However now it seems that I experience more congestion from having it on. I'm not feeling this item and I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Shanel

customer_reviews.title: Quiet strong with time interval settings
customer_reviews.text: This is probably my best amazon purchase yet. I've had it for a few months now and it works great. Has all the settings i could ask for and the growth can be seen in the filter. Super clogged on the prefilter and it's due for a cleaning
customer_reviews.author: Messina

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting not to have to dust as often, doesn’t seem to change that.
customer_reviews.author: Addict Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Perfect  air purifier
customer_reviews.text: I love this and three of my friends also ordered it, I have it in my living room, it is Perfect
customer_reviews.author: levamealona

customer_reviews.title: Works great...no more musty smell
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference in my bedroom which is 20 feet by 15 feet in just a few hours. The room use to have a musty smell being an old house but now it's gone completely. If you increase the fan speed over 1 it can be loud but im use to having a fan on so no big deal for me. I have been using it a month now and its still running strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was given a replacement
customer_reviews.text: Had it put away for a months and tried using it right now and its not working....update i was sent a brand new one that works
customer_reviews.author: kyle t.

customer_reviews.title: not working
customer_reviews.text: brand new but would not start we need to return it and replace another new one hopefully will work this time
customer_reviews.author: gemski

customer_reviews.title: I picked a winner when I bought this!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday, turned it on and is very quiet and has a very high speed to! I really slept great last night!!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but a bit loud (not recommended for bedrooms)
customer_reviews.text: Works great, but a bit loud (not recommended for bedrooms). Would prefer a flatter design that is more difficult to knock over.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Feiveson

customer_reviews.title: It is a great product and I can definitely tell the difference in ...
customer_reviews.text: When I received my InvisiClean air purifier I immediately started using it and have not stopped. It is a great product and I can definitely tell the difference in the air quality, We have less allergy problems, no coughing now, and fresher air. I plan to buy another one for the master bedroom. Don't hesitate to buy!
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: did not last long want to know about return policy
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with how the air cleaner was working until it blew up throwing a spark across the room. It is less than 3months old. I am hoping they will replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Could not sleep more than three hours. was taking meds for stuffed up nose every three hours (overdosing meds). After running this for a couple days I am off the meds. I can finally breathe. I recommend this highly for anyone with sinus problems.
customer_reviews.author: David Roesler

customer_reviews.title: No more stuffy nose!
customer_reviews.text: So I've been waking up with a stuffy nose for some time. One night after using this, no stuffy nose! Some are saying it's loud but to me it's pleasant and only "loud" at the 2nd and 3rd fan setting, everything else is silent. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Donna

customer_reviews.title: I sleep much better with this
customer_reviews.text: Powerful blow, I sleep much better with this. Great circulation. Nothing bad about this !
customer_reviews.author: Jk

customer_reviews.title: Great Breeze!
customer_reviews.text: We like this so much. It is on the smaller side, but does help make the room have more of a breeze!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Overall good cleaner, but the uv light burnt out in less than 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: This seems to work well.. the air quality ...
customer_reviews.text: This seems to work well.. the air quality has improved in the room.. Only complaint is its loud (but expected) on the highest setting..
customer_reviews.author: A Buyer Who Bewares

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works very well.set up was very easy and swift. Cuts down on pollen and dust.
customer_reviews.author: JPV

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up out of the box. Very effective within the first day.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy O'Dean

customer_reviews.title: Air smells really fresh and clean after running for only ...
customer_reviews.text: Air smells really fresh and clean after running for only a couple of hours. I have two dogs and a cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is Great!
customer_reviews.text: Within 24 hours, we've noticed a big difference in air quality. As we prepare for our first child, we've been doing a lot of painting and renovations within the house and at times we noticed the obvious increased of dust etc. In just 24 hours, we noticed that your product is helping us restore our air quality back to it's normal state. We realize that, this is just a short amount of time, but with our early experienced and reading those of which we read prior to purchase, we have full confidence that this product will be fantastic. We've already put another one our baby registry. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: A very good product
customer_reviews.text: Had my doubts at first but I think it is helping us sleep at night. Its removing whatever is stopping me from having a good night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene M. Pedrazzoli

customer_reviews.title: but the filter was in good condition. So far we are happy with this ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a big dog who loves to come inside a few times a day. After buying this air purifier, the living room is fresh and Oderless. When we received it, the package was damaged, but the filter was in good condition. So far we are happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sev

customer_reviews.title: Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this purifier. She is happily resting at night with clean air!
customer_reviews.author: growup

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: The air purifier was put into use in my basement and it seems to be working quite well removing the stale musty odors. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Willie L. Carter

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product would not power on. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Like the rotation side to side
customer_reviews.text: Runs quite and seems to be doing the job. Like the rotation side to side.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky Henry

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: EXCELLENT! We are so very satisfied with this Purifier. My eyes were so itchy & were red + we were sneezing constantly. It all started when we we put the heat on. It was a miracle how quickly it cleared everything up. Feel great now!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia M

customer_reviews.title: I was a Skeptic. After a few hours now I'm a believer. I can breath so much better!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy a air cleaner. I had one years ago and it stayed broken more than it worked. Well I'm glad I gave these things another try. Within hours I noticed my room smelled fresher and I could breath alot better. I run it around 5-10 hours a day. It really moves alot of air fast. I have it in my bedroom which measures 25x22 and it cycles that air really fast. The only issue I have with it is small, when the fan is set on 3 it is quiet loud. But other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Grave Dancer

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this air purifier! I did my research, we actually bought this purifier and another cheaper version for a bedroom. Well I'm returning the cheapy and buying another one of these because it's amazing! I have 5 animals (3 dogs and 2 cats) and this totally improves air quality, reduces hair dander, and floaties in the air. Worth the extra money for sure!!
customer_reviews.author: MandyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Filters air every way you want it filtered -- not just one or two
customer_reviews.text: This is a multi-function air cleaner. HEPA, ion, UV, carbon. The UV is especially important with Corona and flu in the air. It is very quiet. It looks nice. It is extremely easy to figure out. I'm very happy with it and happy that I didn't settle for something that only cleans one or two "dimensions".
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Breathing Easier
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought it for my grandson who has many allergies and asthma. My daughter says its the best one she's ever seen. She moves it from room to room so he can benefit from it wherever he goes. I guess we'll be getting another one! His breathing and congestion is gone and he is now able to sleep at night without waking up for breathing treatments. Finally, something that works!
customer_reviews.author: ShelleyB

customer_reviews.title: One of the best air freshening/cleaning devices on the market.
customer_reviews.text: Although tall, it works like a charm. Easy to set fan speed, timer, UV light etc. Run it for an hour twice a day. Room smells much fresher that it ever has. Cheaper then similar air cleaners. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Marchand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these because I have five cats and a very allergic godson was coming to visit. I cleaned excessively of course, but sometimes that kicks up dust that can linger in the air and actually make things worse. I was really worried that he would be too allergic to stay here the entire time planned so I got these and ran them full blast for three days (night and day) before he arrived and he had virtually no issues. I am very pleased with the way these cleaned the air.
customer_reviews.author: CatsinQ

customer_reviews.title: it really works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought so many smoke eaters, clean air things. and I finally think I found "the one"! it really does it's job!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Gouin

customer_reviews.title: Love! The only possible con is its really loud
customer_reviews.text: Love! The only possible con is its really loud, but this doesn't bother me as I like white noise/background noise. I can already tell a difference in air quality, because I usually wake up with a runny nose/sneezing. This thing is great
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.  Glad I bought them.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with InvisClean. Bought two of them. Both work as expected. I can breathe easier in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it. My son never got stuffy nose at ...
customer_reviews.text: Very quiet.. love it. My son never got stuffy nose at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kulasa

customer_reviews.title: Working great, packaging redundant
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help our cat with her asthma. Using it downstairs in our living room. No problems to report. Came boxed inside another box, inside a huge amazon box, which seems kind of silly to me. It's been working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: B. Cooke

customer_reviews.title: I did have faith in the item but this does not leave a good impression, I'll be returning it for a more ...
customer_reviews.text: Got mine today, took it out the box and it won't even turn on, it will blink and bleep and then shut-off after a second, checked all the sockets in my house just to make sure. I did have faith in the item but this does not leave a good impression, I'll be returning it for a more reliable product.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Miller

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and replace filter
customer_reviews.text: powerful air cleaner. easy to install and replace filter. But price is a bit higher.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! You can tell the difference in air quality within minutes!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it ok, guess it is doing it's job
customer_reviews.author: Joanne Benderman

customer_reviews.title: This unit is NOT quiet, so if that is ...
customer_reviews.text: This unit is NOT quiet,so if that is a priority, you won't get it here! It works well but I have to turn it off at night, as it makes too much noise on the lowest setting...:(
customer_reviews.author: Jessie E. Keener

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this may work but makes too much noise even on low
customer_reviews.author: Robert Charbonneau

customer_reviews.title: I bought this product, but not even one day ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product, but not even one day the uv light already went out. The last time I returned something I had to pay to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its very quite, seems to work very well. Definitely notice a difference.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cates

customer_reviews.title: Both work great. I had a stale odor that would develope ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two units. One for my office and one for my showroom. Both work great. I had a stale odor that would develope over the weeken now both areas smell refreshing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the allergen riddled dust bowl we live in
customer_reviews.text: We got this on an amazing sale! So amazing we got two! We have children with respiratory issues and it helps tremendously during flu season. It's small but mighty equipped with every feature to keep air clean in any room. I love how quiet it is even on the highest level no one even notices it. It hides out of sight as well and doesn't take up any more space than a regular tower fan. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie G.Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: purchased this for my daughters group home, diagnosed with ...
customer_reviews.text: purchased this for my daughters group home, diagnosed with autism and many sensitivities she needed an air cleaner that could have control of an ionizer feature, to put on when she is not there and off when she is. She likes it as she is in a basement bedroom and it helps with allergies.
customer_reviews.author: Joni D

customer_reviews.title: InvisiClean Air Purifier
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money I ordered a second one for my bedroom and will order another for my basement Quiet and slim style goes well in any room
customer_reviews.author: margaret lupton

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner Air
customer_reviews.text: So far is working just fine... I have nothing to complaint about it. It does what it says it does.. I have it running 24hrs day on level 3 and since the first time I noticed a big difference in my room air quality..
customer_reviews.author: Jose Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: This purifier really does clean the air, very good !
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this because Insm allergic to almost everything and since Igor this in my house , finally I am much better, I use to run it in my closet because the humidity is much in this place , so hthat my closet always smells good and clean .
